alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Greater Greenville; Laurens; Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 5:05AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, southeastern Greenville, southern Spartanburg and northern Anderson Counties through 530 AM EST... At 505 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Greenville Downtown to 6 miles southeast of Clemson. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Anderson, Mauldin, Simpsonville, Five Forks, Fountain Inn, Piedmont, Woodruff, Williamston, Northlake and West Pelzer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
